commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Here you all are! You guys haven't gone home yet? Everything's all set up now, so you all need to rest up for tomorrow.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Shouldn't we be saying the same thing to you? I mean, who was the one running around more than anyone else here?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: She's right. Haven't you been working non-stop for the past few days? Try not to collapse before the event even begins, okay?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm okay! Even if I'm not, I'll make sure I collapse AFTER everything's over.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: You shouldn't be collapsing to begin with.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Make sure you eat foods packed with nutrients and get some proper sleep.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: How about I make you something nice and nutritious?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Uh, S-Setsuna! How about we skip the food and I just appreciate your kind gesture? I'll get my sleep tonight to be ready for tomorrow.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Try not to oversleep and be late tomorrow, okay?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Don't you think those concerns should be directed towards Kana?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I'll be fine! I've never overslept on the day of a live show, after all. Besides, tomorrow's extra special!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, if anything you're actually early on the day of a live show. Before I forget, what were you guys all doing here? You should've let me know about the meeting.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Actually, we didn't exactly plan for this... I just felt like getting some fresh air, and when I came out here, I found everyone else around as well.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: My face was burning up, so I came outside to cool down and everyone was here.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: There wasn't any talk about getting together in one place, we just happened to end up like this.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Why did you come all the way up to the rooftop yourself?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hmm... That's a pretty good question. I guess this just felt like the right place?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Everyone thinks the same way!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: *Giggle* Maybe there's something drawing us all together.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: If Ayumu shows up then we'll have everyone in one spot.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Now that almost everyone's here, I totally want Ayumu to show up and complete the set!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: That's not exactly something we can just will to happen.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: But I have a feeling that Ayumu might just show up.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Yes, I think so too.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Oh! I guess everyone really was here.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: We actually completed the Nijigasaki set!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: *Giggle* Our teamwork is totally on point.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Huh? What are you talking about? Oh, Shioriko! Don't linger in the shadows like that! Come on over here!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Right, sure. Is it really okay, though? Am I not imposing?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Don't say things like that! You're an important friend of ours, too!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: The School Idol Festival became a reality because you helped us out, Shioriko.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: No. You all came this far because you persevered and pushed through with your strong will.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Ooh! Looks like you're starting to get us! You're right, I did try pretty hard! This may be the hardest I've ever worked in my life.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: You studied pretty hard in between all of your wailing and whining, huh, Kasukasu?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I didn't wail or whine! And don't call me Kasukasu!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Come to think of it, you were in tears as well, Karin!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Hey! Stop! Let's get off that topic already!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Laugh* Tomorrow's finally the big day. The School Idol Festival really is happening, right? I'm not dreaming, am I?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Relax, it's all real.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: A lot has happened on our journey to get here.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I never thought I'd get to stand on such a big stage when I returned to the club.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I knew we'd get here. That's why I held down the fort all on my own in the clubroom!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: And who was the one who took my letter as some kind of threat and threw it out again?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Th-That was just a little mistake of mine.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Your dismissal as the president of the student council seems like so long ago now, Setsu.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I was depressed back then, but now I'm glad it happened.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Is it appropriate for me to thank you?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Go right ahead. After all, the school has become more lively ever since you took over the presidency, Shioriko.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Isn't that something you can only say now, in retrospect? It was a pretty big ordeal back when it first happened.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Yeah. Shioriko tried to abolish our club.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It's funny to think that we're all gazing upon the stars together now after everything that's happened.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: We're only able to do this because you brought the club together, and got 's and Aqours to join us as well.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I'm totally seeing something now that I never thought I would have before I became a school idol! I didn't think I'd have so much fun.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Who'd have thought buckling down to get something done could be so fun?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: We were able to stay together because we had you here keeping us together. Thank you so much.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Thank you for opening my eyes to the fun world of school idols. Rina-chan Board says, "Dazzle!"

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Not at all... I should be the one thanking all of you. Especially since I've caused so much trouble for Ayumu and everyone else.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: A-About that! I was partly to blame for that as well. I also found out just how much I truly love school idols because of what happened.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Uh-huh! And we got treated to that incredible live stream because you two had that fight. That totally made me cry. AI cried my EYES out, geddit?!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: O-Oh, Ai! What will I ever do with you?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Bahahaha!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: *Chuckle* We should be thanking you, Ayumu.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: She's right. We had all given up on the School Idol Festival back then.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: And you were the one who brought us all back together again, Ayumu.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: W-Well, Shioriko was the one who suggested I do the live stream.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: And who was the one who turned to me in desperation because she wanted to tell everyone everything? All I did was help you express your feelings.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Oh gosh, stop! I could just die from embarrassment right now.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Aww, my little Ayumu! You're such a good girl! I was so touched!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: K-Kanata!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: There's nothing to be embarrassed about! Right, Shio-ti?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Huh?! Wh-Why have you turned your attention to me now?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Well! It's because you're a part of our gang!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Does that mean you intend to work me to the bone again tomorrow?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Wha? W-Well, maybe that's something I can't deny. I really would like you to help us out tomorrow as well... Won't you?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: *Chuckle* You are more timid than you make yourself out to be. You can rely on me. I will support you to the best of my abilities tomorrow.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Aww! Shioko, don't scare me like that!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: *Giggle* Everyone's going to be super busy tomorrow. That means we should all head home and get ready for our big day!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, I just got a text.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Ah, as did I.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: H-Hey, guys! Kaoruko says she's gonna come watch us tomorrow!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: What?! You mean THE Kaoruko? One of the founding members of the School Idol Festival?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Whoa... Now we really need to make sure we're on top of our game.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Anyway, let's make sure we have a blast tomorrow! If we enjoy ourselves, I'm sure our feelings will get across to everyone in attendance!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Yeah!
